mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tk_ticket WHERE content =#{content} AND del_flag = 0
SELECT * from check_batch WHERE del_flag=0 AND `name`= #{batchName} AND category='XX.XXXXXXX.FHCY';

SELECT ci1.id AS checkPartId, ci1.`name` AS checkPartName, ci2.id AS checkItemId, ci2.`name` AS checkItemName, ci3.id AS checkDescId, ci3.`name` AS checkDescName FROM check_item ci3 LEFT JOIN check_item ci2 ON ci2.id = ci3.parent_id AND ci2.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN check_item ci1 ON ci1.id = ci2.parent_id AND ci1.del_flag = 0 WHERE ci3.check_list_id = #{checkListId} AND ci3.`code`= #{pathCode} AND ci3.del_flag = 0

SELECT ps.id AS projectSiteId, ps.part_name AS projectSiteName FROM project_site ps WHERE ps.project_code = #{projectCode} AND ps.del_flag = 0 AND ps.open_status = 1 AND ps.category = 'XX.XXXXXXX.FHCY'

SELECT CASE cbu.role_type WHEN '0' THEN '查验人员' WHEN '1' THEN '整改人员' WHEN '3' THEN '抽检人员' WHEN '4' THEN '管理人员' ELSE cbu.role_type END AS roleName, cbu.role_type AS roleType, cbu.real_name AS realName, cbu.user_code AS userCode, cbu.user_id AS userId FROM check_batch_user cbu LEFT JOIN check_batch cb ON cb.id = cbu.check_batch_id WHERE cb.id = #{batchId} AND cbu.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY cbu.role_type, cbu.user_code

SELECT pae.emp_type AS empType, pae.emp_name AS realName, pae.emp_id AS userId, pae.emp_code AS userCode, pi.provider_name AS providerName, pi.provider_guid AS providerGuid, 'SUPPLIER' as userType, 1 AS roleType, '整改人员' AS roleName FROM provider_assoc_employees pae LEFT JOIN provider_info pi ON pi.id = pae.provider_info_id LEFT JOIN check_batch cb ON cb.stage_code = pi.stage_code WHERE cb.id = #{batchId} AND pae.del_flag = 0 AND pi.del_flag = 0 GROUP BY realName
